Detailed Description

Description:
: Test badly-signed TAs

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_EnsureTestSigningKeyChanged ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
0b0a0d00000000000000000000000001
Focus:
Ensure that the System TA / Driver signing key has been changed from the default (SDK) one. This test MUST pass on a commecial device.
Test Steps:
Attempt to open System TA. Verify that MC_DRV_ERR_WRONG_PUBLIC_KEY is returned.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
Runtime.01300_TASignatures.GC00100_EnsureTestSigningKeyChanged
TestCase_GC00101_EnsureReleaseImage ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
00000000111111111111111100000000
Focus:
Ensure that the TEE image is a RELEASE image (only reliable from 302A onwards, otherwise we cannot reliably determine.
Test Steps:
Attempt to open TA. Verify that MC_DRV_OK is returned.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
302A
Test ID:
Runtime.01300_TASignatures.GC00101_EnsureReleaseImage
